item.title: Tree in Draynor
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Dont worry i wanted to see explaination too when i was a beginner:

public void addoption(String yourQuestion, String text1, String text2, String text3){
sendFrame171(1, 2465);
sendFrame171(0, 2468);
sendFrame126(yourQuestion, 2460);
sendFrame126(text1, 2461);
sendFrame126(text2, 2462);
sendFrame126(text3, 2463);
sendFrame164(2459);
}

Thats the method what it does its: sending some frames (we can use this method to work in the tree id) so how you use it?
So find your object clicking then you probobly have a switch statement, under the switch add this:
case 10041:
addoption(“Select an option”, “Option number 1”, “Option number 2”, “Option number 3”);
break;
all it does is send you a select option.[/code]

Read full topic

@Sup22211 wrote:

public void addoption(String yourQuestion, String text1, String text2, String text3){ sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126(yourQuestion, 2460); sendFrame126(text1, 2461); sendFrame126(text2, 2462); sendFrame126(text3, 2463); sendFrame164(2459); }
Another hint: packets>case 185>case 9157/case 9158.
to make the options actually do something
